alert.note: Alert for Central Walton; Holmes; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 28 at 4:39PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTH CENTRAL GENEVA...EAST CENTRAL WALTON...HOLMES AND CENTRAL WASHINGTON COUNTIES THROUGH 430 PM CDT... At 339 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles north of Bonifay to near Vernon. Movement was northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Vernon, Bonifay, Ponce De Leon, Caryville, Westville, Black, Hinsons Crossroads, Whitehead Crossroads, Cerrogordo, Gritney, Holmes Valley, Smith Crossroads, Knox Hill, Hickory Hill, Izagora, Johnson Crossroads, Miller Crossroads, Douglass Crossroad, Holmes County Airport, and Bethlehem. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
